## AuthContainer.deleteOAuthProvider() method

Deletes OAuth SSO provider.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteOAuthProvider(providerID: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  providerID | <code>string</code> | SSO provider ID |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
